inclusion.criterion: pathological diagnosis of papillary thyroid cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient with negative cervical lymph nodes on pre-, or intraoperative evaluation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: incidental diagnosis of papillary thyroid cancer following hemithyroidectomy and requiring completion thyroidectomy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, previous XRT to neck, and high bleed risk. These factors make them likely ineligible for the trial.
